com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.net
Class PublicKeyTrustManager

java.lang.Object
  com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.net.PublicKeyTrustManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.net.ssl.TrustManager, javax.net.ssl.X509TrustManager
public class PublicKeyTrustManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.net.ssl.X509TrustManager

A trust manager that only trusts servers whose public key hashes are all in the list of trusted public key hashes.

Constructor Summary
PublicKeyTrustManager(int[] publicKeyHashes)
          Constructs a trust manager with an array of trusted public key hashes.

          Constructs a trust manager with an array of trusted public key hashes.

          Constructs a trust manager with an array of trusted public key hashes.

Constructor Detail

PublicKeyTrustManager

public PublicKeyTrustManager(java.lang.String[] publicKeyHashes)
Constructs a trust manager with an array of trusted public key hashes.

Parameters:
publicKeyHashes - The array of public key hashes. Every string is the MD5 hash of a public key that is trusted and contains 16 bytes.

PublicKeyTrustManager

public PublicKeyTrustManager(long[] publicKeyHashes)
Constructs a trust manager with an array of trusted public key hashes.

Parameters:
publicKeyHashes - The array of public key hashes. Every 2 longs are the MD5 hash of a public key that is trusted.

PublicKeyTrustManager

public PublicKeyTrustManager(int[] publicKeyHashes)
Constructs a trust manager with an array of trusted public key hashes.

Parameters:
publicKeyHashes - The array of public key hashes. Every 4 integers are the MD5 hash of a public key that is trusted.
